marcgg # hire

Want To Work With Me ?

Great news, keep reading!

Currently I'm mostly focused on education and coaching, but I'm open to other kind of missions.

What I Can Do For You

Here's an incomplete list of the things I can help you with:

  • Teaching non technical people about development
  • Coaching you or your team to create or scale a product
  • Basic or advanced Ruby on Rails training
  • Implementing development best practices in your team
  • One shot development projects

Why I Can Help

I've been developing for quite a while now, and seen a lot of different environment, development methods and solved my share of problems. I also taught a lot of people, from entrepreneurs to designers, from developers to middle school students.

Recently I helped a young team of entrepreneurs getting accepted into a famous startup accelerator, taught students at HEC about Lean Startup and gave a Ruby on Rails class at HETIC.

Since all this is just me talking, here are some other people saying that I'm a nice guy:

Cofounder & CTO of Birdly, Paris

Teaching, Talking, Mentoring

Here's a quick overview of the people and organizations I worked with or I'm currently working with on this matter.

Contact Me

Before contacting me, know that I'm working full time at Drivy and most likely not looking to leave the company for a project... so you'll understand that my time is limited. However I do accept interesting and well scoped projects.

I'm localized in Paris, so if you need me in person... that's where I'll be ! To contact me, you can send me an email with your project at marcg.gauthier -at- gmail -dot- com. Note that I prefer not to sign NDAs, however, if it's a requirement for you, I'll require a fee to sign it.
